name: OpenAI API Key
description: Detects OpenAI API keys typically starting with 'sk-'.

name: Anthropic API Key
description: Detects Anthropic Claude API keys starting with 'sk-ant-'.

name: Gemini API Key
description: Detects Gemini/Google AI Studio API keys that start with 'AIza'.

name: Hugging Face Token
description: Detects Hugging Face personal access tokens.

name: Groq API Key
description: Detects Groq API keys used for AI inference API access.

name: Google OAuth Client Secret
description: Detects Google OAuth client secrets within JSON or config files.

name: GitLab Personal Access Token
description: Detects GitLab personal access tokens that start with 'glpat-'.

name: Twilio API Key
description: Detects Twilio API keys starting with 'SK' followed by 32 hex chars.

name: Cloudflare API Token
description: Detects Cloudflare API tokens and access keys.

name: Infura API Key
description: Detects Infura project URLs containing API keys.
